original_text: Those were the spirits of people who had refused to obey God long ago. At that time God waited patiently for them to turn to him while Noah was building a large ship. But only a few people agreed to go into that ship. God saved only eight people when the ship sailed on the deep water. The story about Noah and the large ship starts in Genesis 6. The ‘ spirits who were in prison’ may mean all the people who drowned in the water. Or it may mean the angels who did not obey God. 3: Those were the spirits of people who had refused to obey God long ago.
